name: Sniktraak
aura: Increase Ally HP in in all Battles by 33

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. 

If the target is under a [Leech] debuff, has a 100% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff on the target for 2 turns before attacking.
skills.name: Misery Morningstar
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. 

Also places a [Shield] buff on all allies equal to 30% of this Champion's MAX HP for 2 turns. The [Shield] buff cannot be removed if it is placed when there are any enemies under [Leech] debuffs.
skills.name: Cloying Horror
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. 

Also places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on all allies for 2 turns, then heals this Champion by 50% of their MAX HP.
skills.name: Vermin Vitae

skills.desc:
Whenever an ally under a [Reflect Damage] buff is attacked, places a [Leech] debuff on the attacker for 1 turn.

Reflects 50% of the damage this Champion receives back to the attacker. 

Increases the amount of damage reflected by 20% from [Reflect Damage] buffs placed by allies.
skills.name: Soul Rot [P]
